text: Rivella is a soft drink from Switzerland, created by Robert Barth in 1952, which is produced from milk whey, and therefore includes ingredients such as lactose, lactic acid and minerals. It comes in seven varieties. == Varieties == * Rivella Red * Rivella Blue (Rivella Light) * Rivella Green (with green tea extract) * Rivella Rhubarb (in 2014–2016 Rivella CLIQ Rhubarb) * Rivella Tropical Mango * Rivella Yellow (plant-derived Rivella) (2008–2011) * Rivella CLIQ Peach (2014–2016) Dutch Rivella: * Rivella Original * Rivella Green Tea * Rivella Cranberry == References == == Other websites == *Rivella Official website Category:Soft drinks
